video.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
video.synopsis: Peter Parker comes of age in an epic tale that finds him torn between his teenage life and a war between SHIELD and villain Norman Osborn.

episodes.synopsis: When their ship lands on Earth for repairs, the Guardians of the Galaxy team up with Spider-Man and Nova against a threat that has followed them home.
episodes.title: The Return of the Guardians of the Galaxy

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man's dream of joining the Avengers becomes a nightmare when Loki switches bodies with the web-slinger, turning his new teammates against him.
episodes.title: The Avenging Spider-Man: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man and his friends team up with the Avengers to stop Loki and Doctor Octopus from destroying New York City with an army of Venomized monsters.
episodes.title: The Avenging Spider-Man: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Flash Thompson comes to Spider-Man's aid as Scarlet Spider, a piece of Venom permanently attaches itself to him, and a new hero is born.
episodes.title: Agent Venom

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man and Dr. Strange attempt to help the superpowered runaways Cloak and Dagger, but the mystical Dormammu has other plans.
episodes.title: Cloak & Dagger

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man's patience is tested when S.H.I.E.L.D. reveals its perfect candidate to operate the Iron Spider armor: Peter's academic rival Amadeus Cho.
episodes.title: The Next Iron Spider

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man is dispatched by S.H.I.E.L.D. to find a mysterious thief known as the Vulture, a young man who has been subjected to Doc Ock's experiments.
episodes.title: The Vulture

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man travels to the Savage Land with Wolverine to find Ka-Zar, but their search is complicated by the schemes of Kraven and Taskmaster.
episodes.title: The Savage Spider-Man

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man must save Halloween from the sorceress Morgan le Fey when the cast of "Jessie" accidentally releases her from a museum display.
episodes.title: Halloween Night at the Museum

episodes.synopsis: When Spidey realizes he has inspired a new generation of teenage superheroes, he urges them to get S.H.I.E.L.D. training and form a team.
episodes.title: New Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Nightmare takes Spider-Man on a holiday journey through his past, present and future, revealing what the world would be like without him.
episodes.title: Nightmare on Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When the Green Goblin opens portals to alternate worlds and begins collecting Spider-Men DNA, Spidey must team up with alternate versions of himself.
episodes.title: The Spider-Verse: Part One

episodes.synopsis: Chasing the Goblin across the multiverse, Spidey urges Spider-Man Noir to reunite with Mary Jane and helps Peter Porker regain his confidence.
episodes.title: The Spider-Verse: Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Spidey defeats the medieval Doctor Octopus with Spider-Knight, then helps Miles Morales forgive himself for the fate of Peter Parker in his universe.
episodes.title: The Spider-Verse: Part Three

episodes.synopsis: Back in his own universe, Spidey needs the help of the Web Warriors when the Green Goblin injects himself with his DNA and becomes Spider-Goblin.
episodes.title: The Spider-Verse: Part Four

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man's education at the Academy begins, but it might be cut short when a long-dormant villain awakens and sets out to destroy S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.title: S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man and Hulk are the last line of defense when a bitter rivalry between Agent Venom and Rhino threatens to destroy New York City.
episodes.title: Rampaging Rhino

episodes.synopsis: When Fury is infected with Doc Ock's nano-bots, Ant-Man and Spider-Man must shrink down to microscopic size for a battle inside his body.
episodes.title: Ant-Man

episodes.synopsis: Craving Mexican food, Spidey, Power Man and Squirrel Girl sneak out after hours for a burrito and come face-to-face with Spider-Man's enemies.
episodes.title: Burrito Run

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man teams up with Triton when a looming war between the Inhumans and S.H.I.E.L.D. threatens the safety of New York.
episodes.title: Inhumanity

episodes.synopsis: When he discovers that his Academy classmates have been replaced by synthetic lookalikes, Spider-Man puts together a team to solve the mystery.
episodes.title: Attack of the Synthezoids

episodes.synopsis: When Spidey is captured by Arnim Zola, his classmates engage the villain in a desperate fight and give him the chance to break free of the madman.
episodes.title: The Revenge of Arnim Zola

episodes.synopsis: Earth is at stake when Spidey, Iron Man and Hulk are chosen by the Collector to battle Grandmaster's team of Kraven, Molten Man and Wendigo King.
episodes.title: Contest of Champions: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In a new round of the contest, Spidey is teamed up with Red Hulk, Iron Fist and Cap in a game of Capture the Flag against Sandman, Ymir and Blastaar.
episodes.title: Contest of Champions: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Spidey devises a plan to use life model decoys to distract Grandmaster so that he and his teammates can board the villain's ship and save hostages.
episodes.title: Contest of Champions: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Grandmaster has won the Contest of Champions, but a desperate Spider-Man makes a last-ditch proposal for a winners-take-all rematch.
episodes.title: Contest of Champions: Part 4
